short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps analyze and manage Etsy ad performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to my Etsy Ads Helper!

Like many sellers, I was tired of playing the "numbers go up = good?" guessing game with my Etsy ad spend. After diving deep into enterprise-level advertising metrics (like TACOS) and building proper COGS calculations, I created this extension to give sellers what Etsy's ad platform is missing.

I use this daily in my own shop - so it's constantly updated with real-world improvements!

Perfect for:

â€¢ Anyone who's ever thought "I wish Etsy showed me..."
â€¢ Sellers ready to move beyond basic ROAS
â€¢ Data-driven decision makers
â€¢ Growth-focused shop owners

Privacy & Security:
â€¢ Works right in your browser
â€¢ No data collection
â€¢ No external servers
â€¢ Your shop data stays private
â€¢ Secure local storage
â€¢ No account required

Being actively used and updated by a fellow seller - expect regular improvements based on real-world needs! Version 1.1.0 brings enhanced organization, better visibility of your settings, and improved support access.

Questions? Issues? Features you'd like to see? I'm actively maintaining this tool and love hearing from other sellers! Direct support is now just one click away in the extension.

Disclaimer:
This extension is NOT affiliated with or supported by Etsy in any way. This is just something I'm building that I find useful. :)
